channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-25243] Fabric8FlinkKubeClientITCase.testCheckAndUpdateConfigMapConcurrently
item.description:
The test Fabric8FlinkKubeClientITCase.testCheckAndUpdateConfigMapConcurrently fails on AZP with

https://dev.azure.com/apache-flink/apache-flink/_build/results?buildId=27917&view=logs&j=91bf6583-3fb2-592f-e4d4-d79d79c3230a&t=3425d8ba-5f03-540a-c64b-51b8481bf7d6&l=3029

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I will take a look on this ticket.

We do not have bugs in the current implementation. The test failed because of ConfigMap update conflicts. I think we could increase the retry attempt for the testing.

BTW, this is not a major issue in production since we are not updating the HA ConfigMaps concurrently so frequently.
Merged on master via 152ad4fc14920372076c0004793c179141ae10c7. If the issue do not occur after some period I'll close this issue~
I'll first close this issue since it does not reproduced for some days.
